comments:

Steps to reproduce:
1) Check out org.eclipse.jdt.core.tests.model project from CVS (you might need other jdt core tests project in order to compile).
2) Go to org.eclipse.jdt.core.tests.model.DeleteTests
3) Go to line 43 (contains createJavaProject("P"); )
4) On this line, code assist at the location with "|"
createJavaProject(|<-- CODE ASSIST HERE "P");
5) Once the proposals are opened, slightly move the mouse.
6) I got the .log file full of the stack trace above.
